HOME.TITLE_SEO: ifortnite.com - Everything about Fortnite (cosmetics, shop, news, and pro settings)
HOME.DESCRIPTION_SEO: At ifortnite.com, you will find a list of cosmetics, news, the official store, creative islands, events, leaks of new cosmetics, and more. (Fortnite)
HOME.TITLE: Fortnite
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Fortnite is a game where you and your friends team up to battle in 100-player online battle arenas. Play as modes like Fortnite, Fortnite: The Game, and Fortnite: New World.
HOME.COUNTER_DESCRIPTION: Stay tuned for the latest Fortnite cosmetics updates once the countdown reaches zero, with new items every day!
